sub_title: Geologist | Production Engineer at KS Orka Renewables
summary:
Geoscientist with experience in the exploration & development and production projects of the Oil and Geothermal Industry. I am skilled in regional tectonics, structural geology reconstruction, conceiving a geological static model, wellsite operation duty, and 2D and 3D seismic interpretation. Furthermore, I was also involved in the Plan of Field Development, knowing log analysis, geological mapping, well to well correlation, and stratigraphy.
 
Currently, I am working as a geologist for a geothermal exploration project in Indonesia to assist the World Net Zero Emissions. This brings first-hand experience to me in data collecting and formation evaluation during drilling, characterising and evaluating alteration mineralogy, as well as predicting the formation temperature.

Apart from that, my role as subsurface/production engineer strengthen my comprehension of the reservoir characteristic, which gives me good ammunition for geothermal field development

Career Objectives :
To be a geoscientist who implements and develops expertise and skill in the exploration & development sector of the Geothermal energy and Petroleum

Specialities :
Geological modelling, seismic interpretation, stratigraphy log analysis, tectonics, G&G reviews for Exploration & Development.
